title: Please Help, Identify Font.
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what font these lovely serif characters belongs to?

Many Thanks,

Scott

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture-4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144606/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-4_1.jpg) | 80.86 KB |
author: Scott Waring

comments.content:
Thank you very much Chris,

You always seem to know the answer to these questions :D

Thanks again,

All the best,  
Scott
You’re welcome, glad to help. Everyone here seems to have a different selection of typefaces they’re familiar with, I definitely can’t spot them all.
(And you’ll need the alternates to get the angled crossbar “e” and possibly the ampersand.)
